\h(«Brabham»)Bon retour parmi nous.
Eh bien, êtes-vous contents de notre travail ?\e
\h(«Vyse»)Je dois dire que je suis très impressionné !\e

\h(«Izmael»)Ba ba bam !
Qu'est ce vous croyiez, je suis le meilleur
maçon qui n'ait jamais existé ?\e

\h(«Izmael»)Si vous continuez de me payer en or,
j'apporterais d'autres améliorations !\e

\h(«Brabham»)Moi aussi j'ai eu beaucoup de travail !
J'ai fait un nouveau blindage pour la coque du
Delphinus. C'est super-solide !\e

\h(«Brabham»)Une fois que je l'aurais ajoutée au navire, il
traversera ces récifs sans une égratignure !\e

\h(«Vyse»)Merci à tous les deux de ce que vous avez fait
pour nous. Je voudrais que vous nous rejoigniez
à bord du Delphinus.\e

\h(«Vyse»)Cela me fait penser que…… On m'a donné ça lors
de mon séjour à Yafutoma. Pouvez-vous en faire
quelque chose ?\e

\h( )Vous avez donné le “Livre des Polarités” à
Brabham. Il semblerait que ce soit la première
fois qu'il est aussi content.\e

\h(«Brabham»)Sapristi ! C'est la première fois de ma vie que
je vois ce type de technologie !\e

\h(«Brabham»)Avec ce type de moteur, vous pourrez voyager au
dessus des nuages, et plus bas que jamais.\e
\h(«Brabham»)Je vais m'y mettre tout de suite !\e

\h(«Enrique»)Vyse, nous devrions réfléchir à ce que nous
allons faire ensuite.\e

\h(«Izmael»)Je savais que quelqu'un dirait ça ! C'est pour
cette raison que j'ai construit une salle de
réunion dans la falaise.
Vous pourrez élaborer vos projets là-bas.\e

\h(«Vyse»)Vous nous avez construit une salle de réunion ?
Wow…… vous êtes formidable, Izmael. Allons la
voir !\e

\h( )Brabham a rejoint votre équipage comme
“Ingénieur.”\e
\h( )Izmael a rejoint votre équipage comme “Maçon.”\e

\h(«Brabham»)Willkommen im trauten Heim.
Also, wie gefällt euch, was wir mit eurem
Zuhause gemacht haben?\e

\h(«Vyse»)Ich muss sagen, ich bin von eurer Arbeit
wirklich beeindruckt!\e

\h(«Izmael»)Ba ba bam!
Was habt ihr sonst vom größten Konstrukteur,
der je lebte, erwartet?\e

\h(«Izmael»)Wenn ihr weiterhin Gold mitbringt, dann
baue ich gern noch an!\e

\h(«Brabham»)Ich habe meine Zeit auch nicht müßig verbracht!
Ich habe die neue Panzerung für den Rumpf der
Delphinus angefertigt. Sie ist super
widerstandsfähig!\e

\h(«Brabham»)Nachdem ich sie an deinem Schiff angebracht
habe, wirst du diese verteufelten Felsklippen
mühelos zurücklegen!\e

\h(«Vyse»)Euch beiden vielen Dank für das, was ihr für
uns getan habt. Ich möchte, dass ihr meiner
Mannschaft an Bord der Delphinus beitretet.\e

\h(«Vyse»)Apropos…… das habe ich bekommen, als wir
in Yafutoma waren. Kannst du was damit
anfangen?\e

\h( )Du hast Brabham das “Book on Polarity” gegeben.
Ich glaube, er war noch nie so aufgeregt.\e

\h(«Brabham»)Also, bei allem, was recht ist! Diese Art von
Technologie habe ich noch nie zuvor gesehen!\e

\h(«Brabham»)Mit dieser Art von Antrieb kannst du über
den Wolken fliegen und niedriger, als du es dir
je vorgestellt hast.\e

\h(«Brabham»)Dieses kleine Wunder nehme ich gleich in
Angriff!\e

\h(«Enrique»)Vyse, wir sollten uns überlegen, was wir als
Nächstes tun sollen.\e

\h(«Izmael»)Ich wusste, dass dieser Kommentar kommen würde!
Deshalb habe ich einen Konferenzraum in die
Felswand eingebaut. Dort könnt ihr in Ruhe
alle eure Pläne schmieden.\e

\h(«Vyse»)Du hast uns einen Konferenzraum gebaut? Mann……
du bist toll, Izmael. Sehen wir ihn uns mal an!\e

gestoßen.\e

\h( )Izmael ist als “Bauherr” zu deiner Crew
gestoßen.\e

\h(«Brabham»)Of course it's in once piece! A little ice isn't

la briser !\e

Au sujet de ce livre de Yafutoma……\e

des plans que j'ai trouvé dans ce livre.\e

dessus ni en dessous des nuages car votre moteur
n'aurait pas survécu aux différences de
pression ……\e
\h(«Brabham»)……Mais maintenant, le problème est réglé !\e

\h(«Izmael»)Vous pourrez voler au dessus des montagnes et
sous les grandes îles ! Vous pourrez voler
absolument partout.\e

\h(«Vyse»)C'est vrai ? Formidable !
Quand pouvez-vous l'installer ?\e
\h(«Brabham»)Je l'installerai demain à la première heure.\e

\h(«Aika»)Avec le nouveau moteur, nous pourrons visiter
tous les endroits où nous ne sommes jamais
allés !\e

\h(«Vyse»)Allez tout le monde en salle de réunion !
Décidons de notre prochaine destination !\e

\h(«Izmael»)Ba ba bam!
Sie sind wieder da!!! Und der Rumpf scheint
in einem Stück zu sein.\e

\h(«Brabham»)Natürlich ist er noch ganz! Ein bisschen Eis
macht ihm ja wohl nichts aus.\e

\h(«Brabham»)Captain Vyse……
Was dieses Buch aus Yafutoma betrifft……\e

\h(«Brabham»)Ich hab dir einen Motor gebaut, genau
nach den Plänen dieses Buches.\e

\h(«Brabham»)Bis jetzt konntest du weder über noch
unter den Wolken fliegen, weil
dein Motor den Druckunterschied nicht
aushielt……\e
\h(«Brabham»)…… Aber jetzt ist das kein Problem mehr!\e

\h(«Izmael»)Du wirst über Berge und unter große Inseln
fliegen können! Damit kommst du einfach
überall hin.\e

\h(«Vyse»)Echt? Das ist ja toll!
Wann kannst du ihn einbauen?\e

\h(«Brabham»)Ich baue ihn morgen früh gleich nach
Sonnenaufgang ein.\e

\h(«Aika»)Mit dem neuen Motor können wir so viele neue
Länder bereisen wie nie zuvor!\e

\h(«Vyse»)Ok, alles zum Konferenzraum!
Wir wollen entscheiden, wo's als Nächstes
hin geht!\e

\h(«Gilder»)Hey, Vyse!
Thanks for the food yesterday! It was delicious!\e

\h(«Vyse»)Oh, Gilder…
You're leaving already?\e

\h(«Gilder»)Yeah, I need to get going… But before I go, I 
have some news for you… I found out some 
information on the Armada's latest project…\e

\h(«Gilder»)I just heard about this the other day…
It appears that Valua has begun advancing into 
the lower altitudes…\e

\h(«Gilder»)I heard that north of Pirate Isle… 
somewhere beneath the clouds, they're 
building a base on Dangral Island.\e

\h(«Gilder»)It's just a rumor, but I heard that they're 
building a ship that can go into Deep Sky…\e
\h(«Vyse»)Deep Sky?\e

\h(«Gilder»)Yes… beneath the thick layer of clouds… 
immersed in total darkness… 
there is a “bottom” of the world.\e

\h(«Gilder»)No one has ever seen what's below the clouds… 
some people say that it's completely dead… \e
\h(«Vyse»)What could they be looking for down there?\e

\h(«Gilder»)I don't know.
But, Fina's ship sank beneath the clouds, right?\e

\h(«Vyse»)Hmm… you're right. That must be what they're
after.\e

\h(«Vyse»)Thanks, Gilder.
We'll go check it out.\e

\h(«Gilder»)You don't need to thank me!
Good luck, Vyse!\e

\h(«Gilder»)¡Oye, Vyse!
¡Gracias por la comida de ayer!
¡Estaba riquísima!\e

\h(«Vyse»)Oh, Gilder……
¿Ya te vas?\e

\h(«Gilder»)Sí, tengo que irme…… Pero antes voy a darte una
noticia…… tengo cierta información sobre los
últimos planes de la Armada……\e

\h(«Gilder»)Me enteré de esto el otro día……
Parece ser que Valua ya ha empezado a avanzar
hacia las latitudes inferiores……\e

\h(«Gilder»)He oído que al norte de la Isla del Pirata……
en algún sitio bajo las nubes, están
construyendo una base, en la Isla Dangral.\e

\h(«Gilder»)Son sólo rumores, pero he oído que están
construyendo un navío capaz de navegar por el
Cielo Profundo……\e
\h(«Vyse»)¿El Cielo Profundo?\e

\h(«Gilder»)Sí…… bajo una gruesa capa de nubes……
inmerso en una oscuridad total……
está el “fondo” del mundo.\e

\h(«Gilder»)Nadie sabe lo que hay bajo las nubes……
Hay quienes dicen que no hay absolutamente
nada……\e
\h(«Vyse»)¿Que estarán buscando allí abajo?\e

\h(«Gilder»)No lo sé.
Pero la nave de Fina se hundió debajo de las
nubes, ¿verdad?\e

\h(«Vyse»)Mmm…… tienes razón. Eso debe ser lo que andan
buscando.\e

\h(«Vyse»)Gracias, Gilder.
Iremos a inspeccionarlo.\e

\h(«Gilder»)¡No tienes que darme las gracias!
¡Buena suerte, Vyse!\e

\h(«Gilder»)Hé, Vyse !
Merci pour le repas d'hier ! C'était délicieux !\e

\h(«Vyse»)Oh, Gilder…
Vous partez déjà ?\e

\h(«Gilder»)Et oui…… je dois y aller, mais avant de partir,
je dois t'informer des dernier projets de
l'Armada……\e

\h(«Gilder»)J'en ai entendu voilà peu……
Que Valua fait des recherches pour aller en
basses altitudes…\e

\h(«Gilder»)On m'a dit qu'au nord de l'Île des Pirates…
sous les nuages, ils construisent une base sur
l'Île de Dangral.\e

\h(«Gilder»)C'est seulement une rumeur, mais j'ai entendu
dire qu'ils construisent un navire qui peut
voler dans les profondeurs……\e
\h(«Vyse»)Les Profondeurs ?\e

\h(«Gilder»)Oui… sous l'épaisse couche de nuages…
totalement immergé dans l'obscurité…
se trouve le “fond” du monde.\e

\h(«Gilder»)Jamais personne n'a vu ce qu'il y a sous les
nuages… certains racontent que tout est mort…\e
\h(«Vyse»)Qu'est-ce qu'ils peuvent bien y chercher ?\e

\h(«Gilder»)Je ne sais pas.
Mais, le navire de Fina a coulé sous les nuages,
n'est-ce pas ?\e
\h(«Vyse»)Humm… vous avez raison. Ils doivent le chercher.\e

\h(«Vyse»)Merci, Gilder.
Nous irons voir.\e

\h(«Gilder»)Inutile de me remercier !
Bonne chance, Vyse !\e

\h(«Gilder»)He, Vyse!
Danke für das Essen gestern! Es war köstlich!\e

\h(«Vyse»)Ach, Gilder……
Gehst du schon?\e

\h(«Gilder»)Ja, ich muss gehen…… Aber bevor ich gehe……
muss ich euch etwas erzählen. Ich habe ein
paar neue Informationen über das neueste
Projekt der Armada……\e

\h(«Gilder»)Das hab ich erst vor kurzem gehört……
Es scheint, dass Valua begonnen hat, sich in
geringere Höhen vorzuarbeiten……\e

\h(«Gilder»)Ich habe gehört, nördlich von Pirate Isle……
irgendwo unter den Wolken…… bauen sie
einen Stützpunkt auf Dangral Island.\e

\h(«Gilder»)Es ist nur ein Gerücht, aber ich habe gehört,
dass sie ein Schiff bauen, das in Deep Sky
abtauchen kann……\e
\h(«Vyse»)Deep Sky?\e

\h(«Gilder»)Ja…… unter einer dicken Wolkenschicht……
in totale Dunkelheit getaucht……
da ist das “untere Ende” der Welt.\e

\h(«Gilder»)Niemand hat je gesehen, was sich unter den
Wolken befindet…… Manche sagen, da wäre eine
vollkommen tote Zone.\e
\h(«Vyse»)Wonach könnten sie denn da unten suchen?\e

\h(«Gilder»)Weiß ich nicht.
Aber Finas Schiff ist doch unter die Wolken
gesunken, oder?\e
\h(«Vyse»)Hmm…… du hast Recht. Danach müssen sie suchen.\e

\h(«Vyse»)Danke, Gilder.
Wir werden mal nachsehen.\e

\h(«Gilder»)Ihr braucht mir nicht zu danken!
Viel Glück, Vyse!\e

\h(«Brabham»)Oh, Captain Vyse!
We've finished modifying the Delphinus, right
on time!\e
\h(«Brabham»)Lower the pressure shutters!\e
\h(«Brabham»)Start the submergence engine!\e

\h(«Brabham»)Well? What do you think?
We have successfully converted the Delphinus
into a cloud-delving machine!\e

\h(«Aika»)Good job, Brabham!
Now we'll be able to enter Deep Sky!
You really are the best!!!\e

\h(«Brabham»)Why thank you lil' lady… Before you go… 
I heard there's some sort of vortex 
near Shrine Island.\e
\h(«Brabham»)You might be able to submerge through there.\e

\h(«Vyse»)The vortex near Shrine Island? Got it.
Alright, everyone… let's get going!\e

\h(«Enrique»)Vyse…
Wait a second.\e

\h(«Enrique»)Actually…
There's something important that I wanted to
talk to you about.\e

\h(«Enrique»)I… I must return to Valua. I cannot travel with
you any longer. This will be my last voyage 
with you aboard the Delphinus.\e
\h(«Vyse»)What?!\e

\h(«Enrique»)Galcian and the Armada have freed themselves 
from the control of the Valuan Empire and 
are acting on their own free will.\e

\h(«Enrique»)Galcian probably has some sort of terrible
scheme planned.\e

\h(«Enrique»)I must return to Valua and report this news to
my mother. He must be stopped.\e
\h(«Aika»)You… you can't! It's too dangerous, Enrique!\e

\h(«Enrique»)…I know the dangers that I face.
And I'm sure that my mother won't readily
listen to anything I have to say.\e

\h(«Enrique»)But, I am still the Prince of Valua.
It is my duty to go.\e
\h(«Moegi»)But… Enrique…\e

\h(«Enrique»)Princess… do not worry about me.
I don't plan on dying just yet.\e

\h(«Enrique»)I will…
I will return. This, I swear.\e
\h(«Moegi»)No………\e

\h(«Enrique»)Vyse, after we get Fina's ship, could you bring 
me to Sailors' Island?\e
\h(«Enrique»)I'll be able to borrow a ship there… \e
\h(«Vyse»)I hope you know what you're doing…\e

\h(«Brabham»)¡Oh, Capitán Vyse!
¡Hemos terminado las modificaciones del
Delphinus, cumpliendo todos los plazos!\e
\h(«Brabham»)¡Bajad las válvulas de presión!\e
\h(«Brabham»)¡Poner en marcha el motor de inmersión!\e

\h(«Brabham»)Bueno, ¿qué te parece?
¡Hemos convertido al Delphinus en una máquina
que se adentrará bajo las nubes!\e

\h(«Aika»)¡Has hecho un gran trabajo, Brabham!
¡Al fin podremos entrar en el Cielo Profundo!
¡¡¡Sin duda, eres el mejor!!!\e

\h(«Brabham»)No tienes que agradecerme nada, jovencita……
Antes de que os vayáis…… He oído que hay un
remolino junto a la Isla del Templo.\e
\h(«Brabham»)Podríais sumergiros a través de ese remolino.\e

\h(«Vyse»)¿El remolino que hay junto a la Isla del Templo?
Vale.
Atención todo el mundo…… ¡es hora de irnos!\e

\h(«Enrique»)Vyse……
Espera un segundo.\e

\h(«Enrique»)La verdad es que……
Quería discutir contigo algo muy importante.\e

\h(«Enrique»)Tengo que…… volver a Valua. Ya no puedo viajar
más con vosotros. Éste será mi último viaje
abordo del Delphinus.\e
\h(«Vyse»)¡¿Cómo?!\e

\h(«Enrique»)Galcian y la Armada se han liberado del control
del Imperio Valuan y están actuando por su
cuenta.\e

\h(«Enrique»)Creo que Galcian tiene unos horribles planes en
mente.\e

\h(«Enrique»)Tengo que volver a Valua y contarle todo esto a
mi madre. Alguien tiene que detenerle.\e

\h(«Aika»)¡Pero no puedes…… no puedes hacerlo!
¡Es demasiado peligroso, Enrique!\e

\h(«Enrique»)…… Conozco los peligros a los que me enfrento.
Y sé que mi madre no va a estar dispuesta a
escuchar lo que tengo que contarle.\e

\h(«Enrique»)Pero todavía soy el Príncipe de Valua.
Y mi deber es irme.\e
\h(«Moegi»)Pero…… Enrique……\e

\h(«Enrique»)Princesa…… no te preocupes por mí.
No tengo intención de morir todavía.\e

\h(«Enrique»)Volveré……
Volveré. Lo juro.\e
\h(«Moegi»)No……\e

\h(«Enrique»)Vyse, cuando encontremos el navío de Fina, ¿me
podrías llevar a la Isla Los Marinos?\e
\h(«Enrique»)Una vez allí podré tomar un barco prestado……\e
\h(«Vyse»)Espero que sepas lo que estás haciendo……\e

\h(«Brabham»)Oh, Capitaine Vyse !
Nous avons terminé de modifier le Delphinus, à
la date prévue !\e
\h(«Brabham»)Baissez les obturateurs de pression !\e
\h(«Brabham»)Démarrez le moteur de submerssion !\e

\h(«Belle»)I'm going to work really hard!\c
\h(«Belle»)Welcome, Captain!\e

\h(«What do you want to do?»)“Buy or sell ship equipment.”
“Gossip.”
“Leave.”\e

\h(«Belle»)Ohhh! I'm such an airhead.
I gave Brabham the wrong part earlier!
I hope he realizes it before it's too late…\e

\h(«Belle»)I'm not used to running a shop, so I keep making
all sorts of mistakes. Well… I always make
mistakes, anyway… but not the shop kind.\e

\h(«Belle»)But it's my goal to be able to do something
without messing it up! That's what I'm here for!
I'm bound to get something right!\c

\h(«Belle»)I'm going to do my best! I want to be an Air 
Pirate like Captain Clara someday!\c

\h(«Belle»)When we go to Valua, I'll shoot down their 
entire fleet! Bring 'em on! I hope I don't miss 
too much!\e

\h(«Vyse»)Well, actually, we're going to sneak into 
Valuan airspace by flying under the islands.\e

\h(«Belle»)Oh, hehe… Well, I guess that makes more sense 
than attacking the entire Valuan Armada 
head on! Good idea, Captain!\e

\h(«Belle»)I thought we were going to attack them, 
so I loaded more than enough cannonballs!
I even threw in some extra in case I miss.\c

\h(«Belle»)Well since we already have enough ammo, maybe we
should attack them head on! It would be a shame
just to let all of the cannonballs sit there.\c

\h(«Belle»)We're going to Valua, right? Great! I'll get
my cannons ready and I'll blast those Valuans
out of…\e

\h(«Vyse»)Wait a second… we're not going to launch
an attack on Valua just yet. We're just trying
to make our way inland.\e

\h(«Belle»)Huh? Oh, my! I'm sorry! I thought… that we… oh
no… I can't believe how clueless I am.\e

\h(«Belle»)And I polished all of the cannonballs nicely,
too. I was so looking forward to showing
everyone that I could do a good job. Oh, well…\c

\h(«Belle»)Well, although I may have messed up, at
least we have a bunch of polished cannonballs!
Please, feel free to use them!\c

\h(«Belle»)Really? Using those plans that you found, you
can make an engine that can take us underneath
the Great Cloud Sea?!\e

\h(«Belle»)That's amazing!
I may be a little clumsy, but I'll do my best
to help build the engine, okay?\c

\h(«Belle»)We're finally going under the Great Cloud Sea!
I've been practicing holding my breath! 
Wanna see?\e

\h(«Vyse»)Practicing holding your breath? No, no, no… 
As long as we're inside the Delphinus,
we'll be able to breathe normally.\e

\h(«Belle»)Oh, is that true?
I guess that makes sense.\e

\h(«Belle»)I thought that we weren't going to have any air,
so I've been dunking my head in the pond and 
practicing. How silly of me.\c

\h(«Belle»)That's good that we'll be able to breathe down 
there, because I was the only one practicing 
holding my breath!\c
\h(«Belle»)You're going to the Great Silver Shrine, right!\e

\h(«Belle»)We'll have this place looking as good as new, 
by the time you get back! \c

\h(«Belle»)Well, what do you think of the island? I'm 
still tired from chasing the chickens all over 
the place.\e

\h(«Belle»)And with all of the extra debris, we had a huge 
bonfire at the pond. We had the best time!\e

\h(«Belle»)Oops! I wasn't supposed to say anything 
about that… Don't tell anyone I told you, okay?
\c

\h(«Belle»)Hehe, please don't tell anyone that you know 
about the bonfire… \c

\h(«Belle»)I can't believe it's almost time for our battle 
with Galcian… I'm so nervous…\e

\h(«Belle»)But, since Captain Clara and the other Air
Pirates will be fighting alongside of us,
I'm confident we will win!!\c

\h(«Belle»)So, we're going to fight Ramirez! 
I'll do my best!\e

\h(«Belle»)I know I still have a lot to learn, but
I'm going to do my best against Ramirez!\c

\h(«Belle»)Thank you very much!
Please come again!\e

\h(«Lilly»)I'm going to find true love in the skies, 
just like Captain Clara!\e

\h(«Lilly»)I'm going to sail the world and 
find the cutest guy!\c

\h(«Lilly»)Do you think that there are cute guys 
at the Great Silver Shrine? If there are, 
would you tell them about me?\c

\h(«Lilly»)You're going into Deep Sky? 
I've heard lots of bad stories about that place.
Be careful!\e

\h(«Lilly»)If there are any guys down there, they're 
probably all pasty white and cursed. 
I don't think I'd want a guy from there.\c

\h(«Lilly»)We were sitting there at the port, 
and then there were some explosions!\e

\h(«Lilly»)Rocks and stuff started falling, then we 
smelled the smoke! Belle was so scared, 
she started crying!\c

\h(«Lilly»)You're going to Fina's homeland? Wow! Have fun…
Umm… If they have fun there. Fina's pretty
reserved, you know?\c

\h(«Lilly»)Oh, Captain Vyse. I was really scared during 
the battle the other day!\e

\h(«Lilly»)But that Admiral, he was good-looking. 
I love a man in uniform.\e

\h(«Lilly»)But guys that kill people don't really do it
for me. Oh, no offense… I mean, you're one of
the good guys. I don't like bad people.\c

\h(«Lilly»)I see that even you, Captain Vyse, are a little
nervous about facing off with Galcian.\e

\h(«Lilly»)Well, with three beautiful cannon-goddesses
onboard your ship, you have nothing to worry
about!\c

\h(«Lilly»)So, you're going to fight that good-looking 
Admiral for Fina, right?\e
\h(«Lilly»)Haha, that was just a joke. I was just kidding.\e

\h(«Lilly»)Seriously Vyse, lead us to victory! 
Then we can all come back here and party!!!\c

\h(«Nara»)I heard that when Captain Clara was our age, 
she met Gilder! She met him at a port in his
hometown.\e

\h(«Nara»)She fell madly in love with him. But as fate 
would have it, Gilder quickly left the city 
the next day to become an Air Pirate.\e
\h(«Nara»)I guess it was just bad timing. \c

\h(«Nara»)Later on, Captain Clara found Gilder's ship! 
She was so happy!\e

\h(«Nara»)She started firing at his ship to get 
his attention. Gilder fired back. 
How romantic.\e

\h(«Nara»)I really look up to Captain Clara. 
She's so passionate.\c

\h(«Nara»)Captain Gilder must be playing hard to get, 
because he's been running away from her ever 
since.\e

\h(«Nara»)He should know that he doesn't have to play 
hard to get to sweep Clara off of her feet.\e
\h(«Nara»)Oh, well… love is blind.\c

\h(«Nara»)Belle and Lilly were really scared. I think 
they're okay now.\c

\h(«Nara»)You're going to Fina's homeland? 
Be careful, Captain!\e

\h(«Nara»)Captain Clara is searching the globe, so she 
can make Gilder the world's greatest pie!\e

\h(«Nara»)She once attacked Gordo's ship to steal the 
ultimate pie crust from him.\e

\h(«Nara»)I look up to Captain Clara, she is a 
perfectionist.\c

\h(«Nara»)The time has finally come to battle Galcian,
huh?\e

\h(«Nara»)Fighting the Armada… fighting Galcian… it's
all so exciting!!!\c

\h(«Nara»)After we save the world, do you think that guys 
will be too intimidated to approach me?\e

\h(«Nara»)I hope they won't be. I know that there is 
someone out there… waiting for me.\c

\h(«Vyse»)These are our food and supplies…
We buy some of it, and steal the rest.\c

\h(«Vyse»)It really feels good to fire the main cannons
of the Delphinus. There's just so much power
behind them…\c

\h(«Vyse»)Someone left some paint cans here. Come to think
of it… what exactly were they painting, anyway?\c

\h(«Vyse»)These are filled with as many Moon Stones as
we could find. The Delphinus is a big ship
and requires a lot of fuel to keep her running.\c

opened bottle of loqua just sitting here?\c

\h(«Vyse»)It's a picture of Pirate Isle…
Dad said he set up his base when he was 19.
Heh… Looks like I beat him…\c

\h(«Vyse»)I probably should leave this thing alone.
Brabham has a fit if anyone besides him
touches the crane switch.\c

\h(«Vyse»)It's a globe. Even though we sailed all the way
around the world, it's still a little hard to
believe that the world really is round.\c

\h(«Vyse»)Hey, there're models of a bunch
of different ships.
I want one in my room, too.\c

\h(«Vyse»)After voyages, Fina makes us tea
here. It tastes pretty good, too.\c

\h(«Vyse»)Here's everyone's cups. Ugh, I see
that Brabham has put his denture
container next to the cups, too.\c

\h(«Vyse»)Who had the cleaning shift yesterday?
There's still water in this bucket!\c

\h(«Vyse»)This is Brabham's guitar.
He's got a good voice,
even if most of his teeth are gone.\c

\h(«Vyse»)There's all kinds of toys in here.
Air Pirates work hard, fight hard
and play hard.\c

\h(«Vyse»)It's important to maintain the cannons
so they work well when it really counts.\c

\h(«Vyse»)There're some tools and…
Alright… who left their dirty towel
here?! That's pretty disgusting…\c

destination. We should head to the
meeting room to decide on something.\c

it doesn't look like we've got much choice.

\h(«Vyse»)I should probably ask old Brabham
if he's finished with the modifications
before we leave.\c
